title: Daughter of Darkness
tags: journey to the house of grief
find a way into the cloister
content:
nd Handmaiden's Mace.

A Familiar Face Subquest

Before you proceed. look for Nocturne. There is a priestess named Nocturne who used to be Shadowheart's friend, you can trade with her even after you fight Viconia. Her interaction will be recorded for one of Shadowheart's other subquests: A Familiar Face.

Enter the Chamber of Loss.

We must gain entry to the Chamber of Loss, where Shadowheart's parents are being held captive. Shadowheart's final test awaits in the Chamber of Loss. If she succeed
